title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. UPRISERS;
5. C-ant-AB;
10. DE-vi-LED;

12. Rightmindedness;
13. Obs.-cure;

17. RANSOM;

26. FR-issO-n;
27. D-rye-ST;
28. DRAGNETS.

24. Pumps.
